title: Customer Service Practical Competency Enhancement: Case Study for Designing an AI-Integrated Adaptive Collaborative e-Learning System

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science education theories and digital tool application experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze AI-based adaptive learning systems and design personalized content for different learner levels
Learners can develop at least three VR collaboration activity scenarios that promote peer knowledge co-construction
Learners can suggest ways to optimize AI tutor feedback based on formative assessment data
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
